text: Cláudio Pereira da Silva Júnior (born 2 September 1991), known as Claudinho, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Guarani as a forward ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |align="center"|Botafogo–PB |2012 |Paraibano |colspan="2"|—||9||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||1 |- |rowspan=3 align="center"|Chã Grande |2013 |rowspan=2|Pernambucano |colspan="2"|—||16||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||16||2 |- |2014 |colspan="2"|—||2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !colspan="2"|—!!18!!2!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!18!!2 |- |rowspan=5 align="center"|Ituano |2014 |Série D |8||1||5||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||1 |- |2015 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||11||1||7||0||colspan="2"|—||16All appearance(s) in Copa Paulista||3||34||4 |- |2016 |Série D |11||3||12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||23||3 |- |2017 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||5||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||5||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !19!!4!!33!!1!!7!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!16!!3!!75!!8 |- |align="center"|Joinville |2016 |Série B |9||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !28!!4!!60!!4!!7!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!16!!3!!111!!11 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ituano FC players
